name: Coca-Cola
description: Chilled and refreshing classic Coca-Cola served in a cup with ice.

name: Iced Tea
description: Freshly brewed iced tea served cold with a hint of lemon.

name: Vanilla Shake
description: Thick vanilla milkshake made with creamy soft-serve and vanilla flavor.

name: Cold Coffee
description: Chilled blended cold coffee with rich aroma and creamy texture.

name: Orange Fizz
description: Zesty orange-flavored carbonated drink for a fizzy delight.

name: Strawberry Smoothie
description: Smooth blend of strawberries, yogurt, and ice for a fruity refreshment.

name: Mango Smoothie
description: Tropical mango smoothie made with real mango pulp and creamy yogurt.

name: Hot Chocolate
description: Warm and rich hot chocolate made with cocoa and steamed milk.

name: Americano
description: Strong and bold espresso diluted with hot water for a classic coffee.

name: Latte
description: Smooth espresso-based coffee with steamed milk and a light foam topping.
